long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SimplifyQA's in-browser web recorder, that is built over Angular JS,  offers a robust set of built-in capabilities for effortlessly and precisely capturing every move you make when interacting with an application.

SimplifyQA Web Recorder lies between your application under test and the SimplifyQA Agent, assisting you in identifying and capturing web elements and sending them to the SimplifyQA tool, which is used to carry out UI based Test Automation.
